title: Test Automation for Start-ups: How to Kick-start With Confidence webinar
content: Only 1 DAY LEFT until our Test Automation for Start-ups: How to Kick-start With Confidence webinar. Save the date and join the live discussion with Recorder's experts!

title: Test Automation for Start-ups: How to Kick-start With Confidence webinar
content: Tune in to our Test Automation for Start-ups: How to Kick-start With Confidence webinar on November 23, 10 AM (EDT) to learn the hassle-free path to test automation.

title: Calling for all Zorem Recorder users
content: We hope your experience with Zorem Recorder has been well. To help us understand and make Zorem Recorder useful to all users, please fill in this 2-minute survey to let us know why you chose Recorder and any cool perks/upgrades you want to see in the future!

title: If you are using KR on Firefox...
content: We are working on making the new version of KR compliant with Firefox Web Store. In the mean time please use KR on Chrome for the latest updates.

title: Zorem Recorder 5.5.0 demo is available.
content: The demo for KR 5.5.0 with self-healing, command-line execution and Import from Selenium IDE is availiable here.

title: New users can now sign up!
content: The new release contains many bug fixes, one of them prevented new users from signing up in-app. If you were not able to sign up, please try again!
